item.description:
Come and enjoy a complimentary buffet after-work with the organizers as we socialize and network over cocktails at Splash Ultra Lounge on Friday, June 25th, at 6:30pm. Splash Ultra Lounge is located at 150 Kneeland Street, formerly known as the “News Lounge” nestled between Chinatown and South Station in Boston’s Leather District.
You’ll enjoy a complimentary food buffet of crab cakes, buffalo wings, marinated steak tips, burger sliders, crab meat sliders & assorted pastas. For additional info on Splash Ultra Lounge please visit their website at http://www.splash-bos...

I look forward to seeing you!

Directions: 5 minute walk from either Chinatown or South Station “T” stations.
Cover charge: No cover charge, cash bar
Dress Code : no sneakers, t-shirts or hats.
Parking: $20(Valet) or metered parking on side streets
item.name: Rush Hour hosted by Boston Event Guide
